https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lltnxfKikNH91poAR2BTi8f1UGj.jpg The story of Otto Anderson, a grumpy widower who is very set in his ways. When a lively young family moves in next door, he meets his match in quick-witted and very pregnant Marisol, leading to an unlikely friendship that will turn his world upside-down. A Man Called Otto
